Package window

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Input
    For handling mouse, keyboard or joystick input.
    Joystick
    Represents a joystick.
    Window
    Object oriented wrapper class above the native GLFW window.
    WindowParameters
    Parameters for initializing the window.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Input.Key
    Key.
    Input.KeyStatus
    Key satus.
    Input.MouseInputMode
    The mouse's input mode.
    Joystick.JoystickAxe
    A joystick axe.
    Joystick.JoystickButton
    A joystick button.
    Window.MouseShape
    Mouse shape.
